data.title: VIS Productions
data.meta_description: Discover Your Path to Stardom | Explore exciting career opportunities in the entertainment and film production industry with VIS Prodctions!
data.text:
Looking for an exciting summer job in Stavanger? We need dancers and actors who love working with children and spreading joy. Physical fitness is a must for wearing the mascot costumes & walking on stilts. Observant, cheerful, and positive attitude are ideal for mingling in the park! Dance background is a plus.

Send your résumé with height & videos of your skills to Recruitment@visproductions.se.

Minimum age: 18. Deadline: 30/05/24.

Looking for an exciting summer job in Stavanger? We need dancers and actors who love working with children and spreading joy. Physical fitness is a must for wearing the mascot costumes & walking on stilts. Observant, cheerful, and positive attitude are ideal for mingling in the park! Dance background is a plus.

Send your résumé with height & videos of your skills to: Recruitment@visproductions.se. Minimum age: 18. Deadline: 30/05/24.

If you've ever dreamt of a future in the entertainment business, we're here to make those dreams a reality. Our team has over 30 years of experience, and we're eager to welcome fresh talent to our family!

We are always on the lookout for more talent to join our team at VIS Productions. Let’s get in touch!

Send us an email at recruitment@visproductions.se!

If you've ever dreamt of a future in the entertainment business, we're here to make those dreams a reality. Our team has over 30 years of experience, and we're eager to welcome fresh talent to our family!

We are in the lookout for more talents to join VIS Productions on a regular basis. Let’s get in touch!

Whether your heart is set on filmmaking, photography, directing, editing, or any other aspect of the entertainment world, we believe in nurturing your potential and helping you build a successful career.

Contact us at recruitment@visproductions.se today with your portfolio!

Whether your heart is set on filmmaking, photography, directing, editing, or any other aspect of the content creation world, we believe in nurturing your potential and helping you build a successful career.

Contact us today with your portfolio!

Every year at VIS Productions, we come together for something truly special: VIS Camp.

During VIS Camp, our team becomes both students and teachers. We gather to share our skills and knowledge, nurturing each other's abilities in every aspect of entertainment. It's a unique opportunity for us to learn, grow, and inspire one another. Ultimately enhancing our collective ability to bring stories to life.

At VIS Camp, we lay the groundwork for the most talented and well rounded group of performers in the country while also fostering a strong bond as people.

Do you wanna expand your set of skills? Contact arvid.smitt@visproductions.se

Every year at VIS Productions, we come together for something truly special:

VIS Camp. During VIS Camp, our team becomes both students and teachers. We gather to share our skills and knowledge, nurturing each other's talents in every aspect of entertainment. It's a unique opportunity for us to learn, grow, and inspire one another. Ultimately enhancing our collective ability to bring stories to life. At VIS Camp, we prove that collaboration is the heartbeat of innovation!
